a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-U-LAL lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ {LU₂}A-KIN {LU₂}A-KIN ša {1}{d}UTU-tak-lak x x x {1}{d}PA-tak-lak e-gir₂-tu₂ ina ŠU.2-šu₂-nu ina UGU LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ it-tal-ku-ni an-nu-rig ina pa-an LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ a-sap-raš-šu₂-nu ṭe₃-mu ša {1}{d}AMAR.UTU-A-AŠ x x x x x x+x x x x x x x-nu x x x x lil-li-ku-ni
